Desc.entry: A partnership between Sheffield Health and Social Care NHS Trust and No Panic, a national voluntary organisation. Aims to recruit and train up to 15 volunteers to facilitate self-help and recovery-led groups for people with anxiety disorders such as panic, phobias, obsessive compulsive disorder and other anxiety related problems. Aims to develop 4 groups citywide and a group for carers. As the project progresses, No Panic Sheffield will be established as an independent voluntary organisation.
